Name: Ancient Nut
Description: Ancient rodents would feed on this.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Antiguos roedores se alimentaban con ella.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 고대의 다람쥐들이 먹고 살았을 것 같군요.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Alte Nagetiere würden sich davon ernähren.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: いにしえの時代、げっ歯類が食べていた。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Antigos roedores se saciavam com ela.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 古代的啮齿动物就以这种动物为食。
